description.action: Evan, still in his owl form, hoots softly as he leads the group of children into the blacksmith's workshop. His sharp eyes scan the area, looking for any supplies that could be useful.
Isaac, the koala, clings to Evan's side, his small paws gripping the owl's feathers. He looks around the workshop with curious eyes, sniffing the air for any potential threats.
Aaron, the small dinosaur, walks alongside the group, his head held high. He snorts and lets out a soft growl, ready to protect his friends if needed.
Aurelia, the panda, stands in the center of the group, her large eyes taking in the sights and sounds of the workshop. She lets out a gentle hum, her round body swaying as she moves.
The blacksmith, a gruff but kind-hearted man, approaches the group of children. He wipes the sweat from his brow and looks at them with a curious expression, wondering how he can help.
